subject: Organ Donation
Kidneys
Coaches and Managers
Transplants
College Athletics
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tom Walter said that his motivation in donating a kidney was not getting back Kevin Jordan as a player, but giving him “just a chance to be a college freshman.”
snippet: Tom Walter said that his motivation in donating a kidney was not getting back Kevin Jordan as a player, but giving him “just a chance to be a college freshman.”
